subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_01A2_01C9C815.987F0760
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Healthy debate is one thing. Yes, it can be a good thing. I am not saying d=
on't exchange viewpoints with people.  But it is only healthy debate if bot=
h parties are willing to consider the other's opinion. I bet you no matter =
what Frank were to say, these people would never consider a word he says.

=
Just as you say, there has to be a mutual respect between parties in order =
to carry on and intelligent debate, like we are doing with this discussion.=


Frank can stand up all he wants if that is want he wants to do, but for a=
ll that, he won't change these people's opinions, and in the end he will on=
ly invite more hassle from them.

He should see that these people and their=
 opinions don't mean anything to his own personal growth, research and know=
ledge.

Engaging these types in petty argument just drains you of your ener=
gy. There is no winner. It is a waste of time and energy. Energy that could=
 have been put to a much worthier task. It is much better to take the high =
road and leave the haters to themselves.

April

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: Eric VanDuzer 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday=
, April 28, 2009 2:53 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.

=




  Well April I guess we agree to disagree.  I feel that is what is grea=
t about this community.  Each of us has our own opinions.  I just only hope=
 that you can respect mine as I do yours.  Healthly debates are good.  I ju=
st feel that some people just need a little direction as I did.  To me in t=
he end it yes it does just and feul to the fire.  Isn't that how we change =
peoples minds, by debating our opinions.  I mean, I would have never found =
this place if it wasn't for a debate on another site.  All Frank is doing i=
s standing up for what he (and we) believe in.  Thank you Frank 




  On T=
ue, Apr 28, 2009 at 4:14 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresea=
rch.com> wrote:





    These people and people like them don't matter. Th=
e ones that will be swayed without looking into all the facts aren't your f=
riends anyway. Getting into petty arguments with these people just brings y=
ou down to their level. You look far more credible if you don't even give t=
hem any heed. People who are worthy of your energy and really want to know =
the truth will look at both sides objectively. They will come to the source=
, as I have.

    In the end, it will only cause more problems for you if y=
ou engage these types.

    Besides that, who cares what ANYONE thinks? Who=
 cares who sways who? Frank should be doing this for himself first and fore=
most. He is not going to be able to prove his recordings scientifically, so=
 why bother to compete? All he needs to do is prove them to himself.

    I=
t is a total different thing to try and debunk evidence to actually prove s=
omething. The skeptic debunks things so that he may be left with true proof=
.

    That is not what these debunkers do. These guys say everything is a =
debunked, without ever really testing.

    You are always willing to test =
new theories and technologies to really see the truth of it yourself. This =
is why you are not a debunker. If you were a debunker, you wouldn't even tr=
y.

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Eric VanDuzer 
      To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, April 28, 2009 1:38 PM
    =
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.


      Honestly Frank I s=
ay slap too.  I know that I am not very active in this group but I do read =
everything.  To me that was a pure attack.  Yes they are debunkers and they=
 won't believe anything, but if you don't say anything and just back down t=
here is that one person out there that will be swayed they way of the skept=
ic and will not here our side.  Slap away and let us be heard and get our o=
pinions and beliefs out there.  If it touches one person (Like me I used to=
 be one of those "debunkers" then I heard the stuff that comes through ITC =
and EVP research) it is worth the carpal tunnel.  And to add I am a investi=
gator who still uses a debunking aspect toward the investigation,  but I am=
 also a researcher and if there is something new out there I am always will=
ing to test it and see what comes through. 



      On Tue, Apr 28, 2009 a=
t 3:17 PM, Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:





        Y=
ES, yes I do.........LMAO



----------------------------------------------=
--------------------------

        From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie

        Sent: Tuesd=
ay, April 28, 2009 2:56 PM 

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
        Su=
bject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.




        You just want to w=
atch LOL!

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Fransen,=
 Debbie 
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, Ap=
ril 28, 2009 12:48 PM
          Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/artic=
le.



          I say slap them Frank. Slap them hard. LOL



------------=
----------------------------------------------------------
          From: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April=
 Abercrombie
          Sent: Tuesday, April 28, 2009 2:26 PM
          To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/art=
icle.



          The problem with that Frank, is that it is a never endin=
g battle and in the end, you can't win because nothing you do or say will c=
hange them. I just ends up causing you more grief.

            ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
            From: Frank Sumption 
            To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, April 28, 2009 12:23 PM
     =
       Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.



            Well, =
when these jerks slap me, I'm gonna slap back.

             F-S


        =
    On Tue, Apr 28, 2009 at 9:58 AM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh=
ostresearch.com> wrote:





              Not even worth wasting your carp=
al tunnel on that. The guy is a debunker, not a skeptic. It won't matter wh=
at evidence or argument you pose, he, and people like him will never believ=
e it. They are just as bad as people who believe in everything blindly.

  =
            A true skeptic remains unbiased-either way, until such a time a=
s something is proven 100% either way.

              April

              =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: Frank Sumption 
     =
           To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com ; grassharp@yahoogroups.com 
       =
         Sent: Monday, April 27, 2009 7:10 PM
                Subject: [EVP=
-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.



                http://skepticblog.org/200=
9/04/25/box-of-fiends/#more-2199

                 Of course, I had to comm=
ent.

                 F-S
